title: Becoming His
description: Enter the world of Derrick King and the infamous KINGS crime family, where power and fortune reign supreme. In this gripping tale, secrets collide with desire, and one woman becomes the beacon of light in a dark and ruthless world.Derrick, the tall, brooding leader, never sleeps alone but never lets a woman into his bedâ€”until he meets Stellina. A sweet and innocent chef who moved across the country for a change, Stellina is drawn to Derrick's magnetic energy and easy conversations. Little did she know that her encounter with him would plunge her into a world she never imagined.As their lives intertwine, Stellina should have run from the danger lurking beneath Derrick's surface. But instead, she finds herself wanting him, willing to risk it all. Can she satisfy a man like Derrick and keep her own secrets hidden? The journey ahead is filled with passion, suspense, and choices that could unravel their love story.In "BECOMING HIS," experience a captivating romance that delves into the depths of desire, loyalty, and the price one pays for power. Will Derrick's darkness consume them both, or will Stellina's light be enough to guide them through? Prepare for a thrilling ride where trust is tested, and hearts are on the line.Get ready to be enthralled. Becoming His is Book 1 in the King Family Series and can be read alone with its own HEA but you won't want to stop there once you become engaged and enamored by the other characters of this world of anti-heroes.
author: Ami Van
